hints.content: Let's try each strategy one at a time to see if they work.

Add $84+10$ then add $10$.

> $\begin{align}\\
\greenD{84}+\purpleC{11}&=\greenD{84}+\purpleC{10}+\purpleC{1}\\
&\ne\greenD{84}+\purpleC{10}+\redD{10}\\
\end{align}$

>No, this strategy does **not** work.

Add $80+11$ then add $4$.

> $\begin{align}\\
\greenD{84}+\purpleC{11}=&\greenD{80}+\greenD{4}+\purpleC{11} \\
=&\greenD{80}+\purpleC{11}  +\greenD{4} \\
\end{align}$

>Yes, this strategy works.

**The following strategy can be used to add $84+11$.**

- Add $80+11$ then add $4$.

question.content:
**Select any strategy that can be used to add $84+11$.**
